title: Rules difference between House and Senate

content.question: A difference between the House of Representatives and the Senate is that in the House

choices.label: legislative activity on the floor is more constrained by rules
committees are less important in the decision-making process
junior members have more influence over legislative decisions
bills are more likely to be amended on the floor

content.answer: legislative activity on the floor is more constrained by rules

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
